original_text: And the king said, “Let him dwell apart in his own house; he is not to come into my presence.” So Absalom lived apart in his own house and did not come into the king's presence.
korean_text: 왕이 이르되 그를 그의 집으로 물러가게 하여 내 얼굴을 볼 수 없게 하라 하매 압살롬이 자기 집으로 돌아가고 왕의 얼굴을 보지 못하니라

sentences.original_text: “Let him dwell apart in his own house;
he is not to come into my presence.”
So Absalom lived apart in his own house
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 압살롬은 자기 집에 따로 살았으며

sentences.original_text: and did not come into the king's presence.
